content: across 60 - f/o leave long tail for sewing blush marks x 2 - begin with pink 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 - f/o leave long tail for sewing tail base - begin with white - remember that stitches who share an underline should be worked in the same stitch 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet chain 1 double_crochet double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet around 36 - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 5/7 tail puff - begin with brown - remember that stitches who share an underline should be worked in the same stitch 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 flo slip_stitch chain 1 slip_stitch around 18 3 working in the unused back loops of round 1 blo increase around 12 4 flo slip_stitch chain 1 slip_stitch around 36 - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 6/7 assembly more pictures are included on the next page cut off a 12 length of brown yarn and remove one of the plies use the remaining plies to embroider a mouth onto the front of the body use brown yarn to embroider eyes onto the front of the body sew the cheeks onto the front of the body sew the tail puff onto the tail base sew the tail base onto the back of the body sew an ear frill around each ear sew the ears onto the top of the body use brown yarn to embroider french knots onto the top of the body copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 7/7 copyright © 2023 icrochetthings
